name: IQ Pyramid - Brain Puzzle Game
description:
IQ Pyramid puzzle is a super-intellectual game consisting of 12 sets of different shapes. There are 19,878 plane combinations and 2,582 stereo combinations.
Introduce your kids into the whole new world of shapes and colors. This educational toy will help them enhance their mind capability to construct and arrange the balls according to their imagination.
• GETTING BORED OF OTHER TYPES OF LOGIC BUILDERS/BRAIN TEASERS FOR ADULTS? Our Beads Puzzle game is unique and will keep your brain challenged and entertained for years to come！
• STRESSED OUT AT THE OFFICE? Relief is just a decision away! Pull out our Logic puzzles game and watch your anxiety and stress wither away. Our mind building relaxing games are a fantastic way to relieve general anxiety both at work and at home. Think of it as Science Therapy!
• LOOKING FOR THAT SPECIAL GIFT FOR A FRIEND OR LOVED ONE WITH AUTISM? Our puzzles are very effective Creative Sensory Toys for Autistic and Special Needs Children, Montessori Preschool children and Daycare Toddlers and can also aid Adults in Learning and developing imagination. Also effective as Special Education Supplies for boys and girls of all ages.
• WANT THE KIDS TO BE HAPPY AND ENTERTAINED WHILE EXPANDING THEIR MINDS AND BUILDING UP THEIR IQ? Our beads puzzle game is very effective, fun and a great challenge for children. Whether you like to travel by plane or by taking a family car road trip, our puzzles will keep the children great company on the ride.
